abstract: Bank of America is eager to expand in China, the bank’s chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan, said Wednesday, Reuters reported.
snippet: Bank of America is eager to expand in China, the bank’s chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan, said Wednesday, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is eager to expand in China, the bank’s chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan, said on Wednesday, Reuters reported.

headline.main: BofA Looking to Expand in China, Chief Says

abstract: Independent News & Media, which owns the British daily The Independent, its Sunday counterpart and its Web site, said Thursday that it had struck a deal for Alexander Lebedev to take over the publications, with INM contributing 9.25 million over the next ten months under the terms of the agreement.
snippet: Independent News & Media, which owns the British daily The Independent, its Sunday counterpart and its Web site, said Thursday that it had struck a deal for Alexander Lebedev to take over the publications, with INM contributing 9.25 million over t...
lead_paragraph: Independent News & Media, which owns the British daily The Independent, its Sunday counterpart and its Web site, said Thursday that it had struck a deal for Alexander Lebedev to take over the publications, with I.N.M. contributing £9.25 million over the next ten months under the terms of the agreement.

headline.main: Lebedev New Owner of London’s Independent

abstract: AT&T is giving a wider roll out to its 3G MicroCell, which can connect to a D.S.L. or cable connection and beam out 3G service over a 5,000-square-foot area. The catch: it costs $150.
snippet: AT&T is giving a wider roll out to its 3G MicroCell, which can connect to a D.S.L. or cable connection and beam out 3G service over a 5,000-square-foot area. The catch: it costs $150.
lead_paragraph: Last December I wrote about some of the strange rituals iPhone users have adopted while trying to make phone calls on AT&T‘s flaky cellular network. One idea I put forward was the creation of iPhone booths that would let iPhone customers know where there is a strong AT&T signal, to spare them having to walk around in circles saying “Can you hear me now?”

headline.main: Want Better AT&T Cell Service? Now You Can Buy It

abstract: David Pogue tests Line2, an iPhone application that allows users to set up a second phone line, which can make calls over the AT&T network or over the Internet.
snippet: David Pogue tests Line2, an iPhone application that allows users to set up a second phone line, which can make calls over the AT&T network or over the Internet.
lead_paragraph: David Pogue tests Line2, an iPhone application that allows users to set up a second phone line, which can make calls over the AT&T network or over the Internet.

abstract: The reading list includes AT&T 3G dog collars and femtocells needed to bolster AT&T coverage.
snippet: The reading list includes AT&T 3G dog collars and femtocells needed to bolster AT&T coverage.
lead_paragraph: This bunch of headlines sound as if they were written by the folks at The Onion, but only one really was. Here’s  what caught the eyes of the tech editors and reporters of The New York Times on Thursday:

headline.main: What We’re Reading: Wii Movies, Spam and Dog Collars
